title: Rubric grader task pane add-in for OneNote on the web
shortDescription: Explore the basics of OneNote add-ins with a sample add-in.
longDescription: Explore the basics of OneNote add-ins with a sample tool for teachers.

references.name: Office Add-ins platform overview
references.description: You can use the Office Add-ins platform to build solutions that extend Office applications and interact with content in Office documents.
